citations.narrative:
***There is no perimeter fence surrounding the addition to the lemur house. The lemur houses have attached outside
exercise pens that do not have a perimeter fence. There is a five foot barrier fence that runs along the public viewing side
of the enclosure that prevents access to the lemurs but no perimeter fence surrounding the entire enclosure. A perimeter
fence of six feet in height is required to restrict animals and unauthorized persons from going through it or under it and
having contact with the lemurs. In addition, the fence will serve as a secondary containment system in the event that a
lemur is able to escape its enclosure. Correct by August 21, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
n

narrative:
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
***There is no perimeter fence surrounding the addition to the lemur house. The lemur houses have attached outside 
exercise pens that do not have a perimeter fence. There is a five foot barrier fence that runs along the public viewing side 
of the enclosure that prevents access to the lemurs but no perimeter fence surrounding the entire enclosure. A perimeter 
fence of six feet in height is required to restrict animals and unauthorized persons from going through it or under it and 
having contact with the lemurs. In addition, the fence will serve as a secondary containment system in the event that a 
lemur is able to escape its enclosure. Correct by August 21, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
